entry.title: BIP Proposals for Output Script Descriptors
entry.summary: There is a discussion on whether there are plans to support time locks in descriptors other than 'raw'. Along with this, there are also talks about integrating miniscript more closely with descriptors. Blockchain Commons libraries and tools are multisig descriptor-centric and there are several scenarios that require describing time locks. One such scenario is the designing of Multisig for Independence and Resilience, as mentioned by Christopher Allen.
